channel.title: Firemaking Help
channel.description:
I've added full firemaking in my server but there is one problem. Could anyone help me make it so the fire's disappear and are replaced by ashes? I was thinking of adding a timer under the case (2372) but wasn't sure if it would work.
Any help?

item.title: Firemaking Help
item.dc:creator: @tehscapeee tehscapeee
item.description:
@tehscapeee wrote:

But would I add it under the case? Or somehow add it somewhere else. Maybe I could create a void and set it up…

Read full topic

item.title: Firemaking Help
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Yeah timer would be the only way to make it work…
And when the timer reaches zero, replace the object that was placed with a new object, the ashes… DUN DUN DUN dunnn

Read full topic
